text: 100 unique contributors to Yggdrasil since January 1st, 32 in the last 30 days only

elements.text: 100 unique contributors to Yggdrasil since January 1st, 32 in the last 30 days only

text:
the estimation of 100 unique contributors came from looking at <https://github.com/JuliaPackaging/Yggdrasil/graphs/contributors?from=2020-01-01&to=2020-12-16&type=c>, but it turns out GitHub always shows 99/100 contributors at most.
```git log --pretty=format:%aN --since="2020-01-01" | sort -u | wc -l```
gives me 150 unique contributors this year.  I saw a couple of repetitions, but not many more than that
